meanings.sent1: She always misguesses the answer on the math test.
meanings.sent2: I misguess the time it takes to walk to school.
meanings.sent3: He misguesses the number of jellybeans in the jar every time!
meanings.sent4: Don't misguess the importance of studying for the exam.
meanings.sent5: The detective's misguess led to the wrong suspect being arrested.

meanings.sent1: Her misguess about the weather made her forget her umbrella.
meanings.sent2: The misguess about the cost of the project caused delays.
meanings.sent3: The misguess in the game made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His misguess was like a puzzle piece that didn't fit.
meanings.sent5: The misguess in the mystery novel kept readers guessing until the end.
